Shroombears are small rodent-like mammals located in the grassy plains of the
4th Layer. They are usually found in smaller groups as they quickly become prey when alone. This is also why they steer clear of darker areas. :hypers:
§#1fab44-#fcc82b-#423924§Behaviour Details: The Shroombears special trait is its ability to nuture itself back to health when hurt. They usually flee Delvers, but can be tempted with Parasitic Watershroom. These can be found on their back or growing throughout the 4th Layer. :hypers:
§#1fab44-#fcc82b-#423924§Item Drops: If a Delver should manage to capture a Shroombear, be sure to collect the
Parasitic Watershrooms that grow on its back, as they are great for healing wounds. Their
meat is also edible but has a questionable smell. :hypers:
